title: Work
text:
I have worked at my first company, Rocket Path PC, for almost 5 years.

Despite my background in React, I initially learned Drupal and PHP on the job. I contributed to several E-commerce websites and independently managed the development of numerous presentation websites along with SCSS and jQuery.

Taking charge of the HTML landing pages delivery, I solidified my styling skills and optimized the process saving significant time.

For the past 2.5 years I've been a part of the React team, where we developed decoupled E-commerce websites with Next.js and Chakra UI.

Since my schedule these years was packed, there was little room for personal projects. However I am currently studying TypeScript, TailwindCSS and more, creating projects some of which are detailed below:
